name: SWE-Agent Codespace
onCreateCommand:
sudo usermod -aG docker vscode && sudo chmod 666 /var/run/docker.sock && docker pull sweagent/swe-agent && conda env create -f environment.yml && conda init && echo '
conda activate swe-agent
' >> ~/.bashrc && echo 'Welcome to SWE-agent!
Please insert your OpenAI token into keys.cfg and then you can run SWE-agent, as explained in the README.
'
